TopicTitle: Astronomer's Visual Pack is looking kinda sussy!

Articles.Content:
55 minutes ago, Joka said:

WHY THIS IS HAPENNS!?!?!?

file:///C:/Users/%D0%96%D0%BE%D0%BA%D0%B0/Desktop/fgh.png

Mods:

file:///C:/Users/%D0%96%D0%BE%D0%BA%D0%B0/Desktop/mods.png

The links you provided are to files on your computer, they are impossible for anyone but you to access.

You need to upload the images to an image sharing website like imgur in order to share them with other people.

Edited May 26, 2022 by MechBFP

We can’t see files on your hard drive (if we could, you’d have far bigger problems to worry about!), to post them here you need to upload them to a sharing site and post links here- for images use a site like Imgur and for log files use something like Dropbox or Google Docs; preferably something that isn’t full of aggressive pop-ups or malicious trackers.

You can also embed images into your posts using the “insert image from URL” button in the bottom right of the typing area. This requires a link for the image itself, which requires a little bit of URL surgery to turn e.g. http://imgur.com/qwerty into http://i.imgur.com/qwerty.png so it can be displayed like this:

You don't need to.

You can just click on upload content (or something), you don't have to be a member or anything like that.

Edited May 28, 2022 by modus
